heading: Press Coverage
subheading: Explore the latest coverage of Las Muertes Film.

articles.title: Honoring ‘Las Muertes’
articles.description: It follows longtime D.C. poet and community activist Quique Avilés, who led the production of the film, and other local Salvadoran artists, including a photographer, a dancer and musicians.
articles.quote: It follows longtime D.C. poet and community activist Quique Avilés, who led the production of the film, and other local Salvadoran artists, including a photographer, a dancer and musicians. They explore the often unspoken, intergenerational traumas that have shaped the community of more than 200,000 throughout the D.C. metro area.

articles.title: Artists In Times Of War
articles.description: The film tells the story of Washington’s Salvadoran community through art, injustice, and perseverance.

articles.title: Documentary uses art to explore the making of D.C.’s Salvadorian community
articles.description: Documentary uses art to explore the making of D.C.’s Salvadorian community
